measured_by: relative adjustment score s = (second estimate – first estimate) / (peer estimate – first estimate)
justification: "We measure social information use (s) as the relative adjustment from first to second estimates (see Fig. 1 for formal definition)."

measured_by: categorical coding of s where stay = 0, compromise = 0<s<1, copy = 1
justification: "We considered three heuristics: stay (ignore social information; s=0), compromise (0<s<1) and copy (s=1)."
